option1: Defining the mathematical framing of an algorithm's run-time performance

question: What is a binary search tree?
option1: Used to implement an associative array, a structure that can map keys to values
option2: An ordered set of data elements, each containing a link to its successor
option3: Each node has at most two children, referred to as the left child and right child.
